title: Wrongful Termination - Sarah Chen vs TechCorp Solutions
summary: Employee alleges wrongful termination after reporting safety violations. Claims retaliation and seeks reinstatement plus damages. Company claims termination was due to performance issues and budget cuts.

title: Breach of Software License Agreement - DataFlow Inc vs CloudTech
summary: Software vendor alleges client exceeded license terms by deploying software on unauthorized servers. Seeking damages of $250,000 and injunctive relief. Client claims license terms were ambiguous.

title: Outstanding Invoice Collection - Premier Consulting vs StartupXYZ
summary: Consulting firm seeks collection of $45,000 in unpaid invoices for strategic planning services. Client disputes quality of work and claims breach of service agreement.

title: Discrimination and Hostile Work Environment - James Wilson vs MegaCorp
summary: Employee claims age discrimination and hostile work environment after being passed over for promotion multiple times. Alleges younger, less qualified candidates were promoted instead.

title: Non-Compete Violation - InnovateTech vs Former Employee
summary: Technology company seeks injunction against former senior developer who joined competitor within restricted period. Claims violation of non-compete agreement and theft of trade secrets.

title: Medical Services Payment Dispute - HealthFirst vs Insurance Co
summary: Medical practice seeks payment of $78,500 in denied insurance claims. Insurance company claims services were not medically necessary and outside policy coverage.
